"He had another stroke about half an hour ago. Courage, my friend . . ." 
Pierre's mind was in such a confused state that the word "stroke" suggested to him a blow from something. He looked at Prince Vasfli in perplexity, and only later grasped that a stroke was an attack of illness. Prince Vastti said some- thing to Lorrain in passing and went through the door on ti
